\begin{equation}
\left(\matrix{\alpha&a \cr
                b &\beta \cr}\right) 
  \left(\matrix{\gamma&c \cr
                d &\delta \cr} \right)=
 \left(\matrix{\alpha \gamma+a \cdot d & \alpha c+\delta a- b \times d \cr
               \gamma b+\beta d+a \times c & \beta \delta +b \cdot c \cr} 
\right)
\

\begin{equation}                 
\Pi_{\alpha\beta}(\Omega)={\rm Tr}(P_\alpha\cdot U(\Omega)P_\beta)={\rm Tr}(P_\alpha\cdot
\{\Omega P_\beta\Omega\})={\rm Tr}(U(\Omega)P_\alpha\cdot P_\beta) \label{eq:yedi}   
\
